title: Secretar. Founded on the story of the Casket Letters
author: Beatty, W.
snippet: by the heavy rains that had swollen the heid waters up by Gladhouse and the moorfoot, the tempest having wasted its fury fromthere to Embro', ganging about us by way of the Scaldlaw andthe Braids, and so on till it drowned itself in the firth.
